p: Where (A): CLOX MIC in combination with EO; (B): EO MIC in combination with CLOX; (MIC)a and (MIC)b: MIC of the antimicrobial and EO alone, respectively. Synergism (S) was considered if FIC ≤ 0.5; partial or low synergism (PS) if 0.5 < FIC < 1; indifference or addition (I) if 1 ≤ FIC <2 and antagonism (A) when FIC ≥ 2.
